entities.name: Systran SAS
entities.description: The target company, offering expert automated translation software solutions with key advantages in security, performance, user experience, and customization.

entities.name: ChapsVision

entities.description: A provider of Computer-Assisted Translation (CAT) tools that Systran's solutions integrate with.

entities.description: A provider of Computer-Assisted Translation (CAT) tools that Systran's solutions integrate with.

dealRationaleHighlights: Overview of Systran's product key advantages

entities.name: Automated translation software solutions
entities.description: Systran's core offering, positioned as a one-stop-shop for expert automated translation.

entities.name: Systran's translation engine
entities.description: The core technology of Systran's products, whose performance can be improved by clients using their own translation data.

entities.name: Model Studio
entities.description: An application developed by Systran to empower clients to autonomously improve their translation engine performance using their own data.

entities.name: Pre-trained models
entities.description: Models offered by Systran, pre-trained on specific datasets for specialized use cases.

entities.name: Web browser plugins
entities.description: Integration solution provided by Systran for seamless user experience within web browsers.

entities.name: Microsoft Connectors
entities.description: Connectors developed by Systran for integration with various Microsoft environments.

entities.name: Microsoft Office Add Ins
entities.description: Specific add-ins for Microsoft Office applications, part of Microsoft Connectors.

entities.name: Microsoft Teams
entities.description: Integration for Microsoft Teams, part of Microsoft Connectors.

entities.name: Windows Explorer
entities.description: Integration for Windows Explorer, part of Microsoft Connectors.

entities.name: Emails automatics translation On clients’ email (SMTP) server
entities.description: An automatic email translation service that operates directly on clients' SMTP servers.

entities.name: Cat tools integration
entities.description: Systran's capability to integrate with popular Computer-Assisted Translation (CAT) tools such as XTM international, SDL, and MEMSOURCE.

entities.name: Security
entities.description: A key product advantage of Systran, ensuring data protection and compliance. Features include flexible hosting options (on-premise, client servers, private Cloud), full disconnection from the Internet, and a policy of not using client data for general model improvement. This complies with demanding client requirements.

entities.name: Performance
entities.description: A key product advantage of Systran, related to translation quality and breadth. Supports over 140 language pairs (including rare ones like Takij and Tagalok) and numerous file formats (MS Office, PDF, Open office, Web, Localization, Audio, Images (OCR), Archives). It aims to answer multiple client needs and use-cases with great translation quality.

entities.name: User experience
entities.description: A key product advantage of Systran, focusing on seamless integration into user workflows. Includes integration with popular work environments via web browser plugins, Microsoft Connectors, and CAT tools. The goal is to integrate seamlessly into the user’s work environment.

entities.name: Customization
entities.description: A key product advantage of Systran, allowing adaptation to client-specific needs. Clients can use their own translation data (translation memory) to improve Systran’s engine performance. Systran also offers pre-trained models on specific datasets and assists clients with Model Studio. This feature adapts to clients’ specific Tone of Voice.

entities.name: OCR
entities.description: Optical Character Recognition technology, specifically mentioned for translating content from images.

entities.name: Translation memory
entities.description: Client's own translation data that can be used to improve Systran’s translation engine performance, a core aspect of its customization capabilities.

entities.name: Legal
entities.description: An industry vertical for which Systran offers specialized pre-trained models.

entities.name: Health
entities.description: An industry vertical for which Systran offers specialized pre-trained models.

entities.name: Automated translation
entities.description: The primary use case addressed by Systran's software solutions, providing expert automated translation.

entities.characteristics: Positioned as a one-stop-shop for expert solutions.

entities.description: Systran recently developed Model Studio, an application designed to empower clients in customizing their translation engine.

entities.officeSpecificInfo: Systran's solutions can be hosted on-premise, providing enhanced security and control.
Systran's solutions can be hosted directly on client servers.
Systran's solutions can be hosted in a private Cloud environment.
